text: 4 Aces out of 4 can be chosen only in 1 way. There are 4 possible suits in a deck of cards and we can choose one in 4 ways. A suit has 13 cards and excluding ACE, 12. We can select 9 cards from them in 2Cy ways. So, total number of ways = 1 x 4 X 1209 =4 x 1204 =4 x 12110 _ gy, (O answered Jun 28 2020 - selected Feb 2 2022 bv Shaik Masthan
